attributes.title: Coca Cola
attributes.description:
Created on June 25, 2010 by lardon on Sourcemap.org:

Coca colas bottles are processed the following way :
-Rats hunting in the streets of Beijng, China
-Chopping of the rats into thin slices
-Expedition to New Orleans, LA, US
-Soaking into New Mexico Gulf waters for impregnation with BP Petroleum light crude oil.
-Expedition to London, UK
-Mixing of the rats
-Addition of public water to the obtained blend
-Expedition to Atlanta, US for botteling and addition of sustainable Coca Cola Inc stickers.
-Back to Wall Mark foods department
-Consumption by average big, fat ass americans.
